course.subject: CENG
course.name: Introduction to Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering
course.description: This is the course to introduce the students about the history and modern development of chemical and biomolecular engineering.  The instructor will highlight the key developments in the chemical and biomolecular discipline, discuss about the career perspectives of chemical and biomolecular engineers locally and globally.  The frontiers of the development of chemical and biomolecular industries and academic research will be examined.  Graded P or F.
